com.netflix.imflibrary.writerTools.utils

Class IMFUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.imflibrary.writerTools.utils.IMFUtils

  • public class IMFUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that provides utility methods to help with serializing an IMF CPL to an XML document
